snippet: Shares in the online coupon giant tumbled as much as 10 percent on Friday, and by midafternoon remained mired at about $9.65 a share, as a lockup on insider selling expired.
abstract: Shares in the online coupon giant tumbled as much as 10 percent on Friday, and by midafternoon remained mired at about $9.65 a share, as a lockup on insider selling expired.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: As Lockup Expires, Groupon's Shares Plunge
